msg: HADOOP-1934. Replace spaces with underscores in the platform name so that
the c++ build works on Mac OS. (omalley)

author: dhruba
msg: HADOOP-1914. Introduce a new NamenodeProtocol to allow secondary
namenodes and rebalancing processes to communicate with a primary

author: omalley
msg: Merge -r 581341:581342 from trunk to 0.14. Fixes HADOOP-1972.

author: omalley
msg: HADOOP-1972.  Fix LzoCompressor to ensure the user has actually asked

author: dkulp
msg: * Workaround bug in Spring where Maps injected into contructors are always copied into LinkedHashMaps thus loosing concurrency contraints as well as causing all "delayed" beans to be creates/resolved immediately.  (This includes bindings, conduits, destinations, and a bunch of ws-policy assertion things).

* Create ClientOnlyHTTPTransportFactory for use with clients that don't need ws-a style callback things.  (this is part 1.   There are still areas in the code that check for transport Id's from the destinations instead of conduits.   In this case, there will not be a destination registered.)
* For our tests, don't close down the port.  It's causing all kinds of hangs on my Linux box.  (probably bug in JDK or jetty)
